name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Dennis McDONALD, Appellant

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and PACKEL, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Dennis McDONALD, Appellant.
attorneys: Lester G. Nauhaus, Paulette J. Balogh, Asst. Public Defender, Pittsburgh, for appellant.

casebody.head_matter:
378 A.2d 862
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Dennis McDONALD, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 26, 1977.
Decided Oct. 28, 1977.
Lester G. Nauhaus, Paulette J. Balogh, Asst. Public Defender, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Robert L. Eberhardt, Asst. Dist. Atty., Pittsburgh, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and PACKEL, JJ.
